about_the_game:
As of right now the Demo will simply be a couple of iterations behind the Early Access version, we would like to make this an actual Demo eventually so it can give the same taste of the full game (or as much as it's done) only cutting on playtime or content, but as of right now we have not achieved that.

How do I know if this is the "actual" Demo?
"If you are seeing this it means we do not have a proper Demo at the moment."

This demo is a showcase of Omnimancer, while it doesn't have all the content from the actual game, it's here to give anyone who wish to try the game a taste before deciding if they actually want to support the game during the development in early access or purchase it entirely after the release.
